title: Red team
author: Bryce G.
description: Cumon is a method of individual development, which is used by 4 million children in 49 countries. Each book is a stepping stone to a certain skill and is designed for several lessons. The child independently performs game tasks, which gradually become more complicated.

title: The end of the road
author: Lawson M.
description: The range of events in Mary Lawson's novel is truly vast - from the famous  in the Canadian province of Ontario in the early twentieth century to London in 60 years. The writer describes with great accuracy the nuances and vicissitudes of the life of a large family, all members of which are full of conflicting aspirations, and do not dare to neglect their duty to each other. This is subtle, ironic and thoughtful prose, a real  for connoisseurs of deep novels.

title: Guardian angel
author: Vinokurov O.
description: Karl von Clausewitz's well-known statement The Mist of Uncertainty concerns the state of the theater of operations. It is not surprising that truly effective methods of predicting options in the absence of reliable information and counteracting possible surprises were first developed by the military.

title: Pure architecture
author: Martin R.
description: By using the universal rules of software architecture, you can significantly increase the productivity of developers throughout the life cycle of any software system. Legendary software master Robert K. Martin reveals these rules in his book and helps apply them.

title: Start the engine!
